description: Uniquely identifies the fund. Capital funds are preceded by the letter C in the data.

Unique identifier for a funds center. A funds center represents the lowest level of organizational detail within a department and can represent a team, function, or facility within a department. Department group, name, division, and section represent groupings of funds centers.
Describes the smallest subset of an account group, typically defined by a specific function, service, or item
Uniquely identifies an expense or revenue account. Revenue accounts begin with a 4 while expense accounts begin with a 5.
